cards.flavor: "I served the Scarab in an age long past, in another form, under another name. No matter their visage, I serve."
cards.name: Hashaton, Scarab's Fist
cards.text: Whenever you discard a creature card, you may pay {2}{U}. If you do, create a tapped token that's a copy of that card, except it's a 4/4 black Zombie.

cards.name: Pia Nalaar, Chief Mechanic
cards.text:
Whenever one or more artifact creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, you get {E}{E} (two energy counters).
At the beginning of your end step, you may pay one or more {E}. If you do, create an X/X colorless Vehicle artifact token named Nalaar Aetherjet with flying and crew 2, where X is the amount of {E} spent this way.

cards.name: Saheeli, Radiant Creator
cards.text:
Whenever you cast an Artificer or artifact spell, you get {E} (an energy counter).
At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may pay {E}{E}{E}. When you do, create a token that's a copy of target permanent you control, except it's a 5/5 artifact creature in addition to its other types and has haste. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.

cards.flavor: Each time he glimpsed oblivion, he learned another lesson.
cards.name: Temmet, Naktamun's Will
cards.text:
Vigilance, menace
Whenever you attack, draw a card, then discard a card.
Whenever you draw a card, Zombies you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

cards.flavor: The edge of Naktamun was once protected by Kefnet. The honored mummies who patrol it now do so in his image.
cards.name: On Wings of Gold
cards.text:
Creatures you control that are Zombies and/or tokens get +1/+1 and have flying.
Whenever one or more cards leave your graveyard, create a 1/1 white Zombie creature token.

cards.flavor:
"Each cataclysm only strengthens our resolve."
-Pytamun, Nef-tomb priest
cards.name: Priest of the Crossing
cards.text:
Flying
At the beginning of each end step, put X +1/+1 counters on each creature you control, where X is the number of creatures that died under your control this turn.

cards.name: Renewed Solidarity
cards.text:
As this enchantment enters, choose a creature type.
Creatures you control of the chosen type get +1/+0.
At the beginning of your end step, for each token you control of the chosen type that entered this turn, create a token that's a copy of it.

cards.flavor: It wasn't that his students were better; it was that his students had made him better.
cards.name: Wizened Mentor
cards.text: Whenever an opponent activates an ability of a permanent that isn't a mana ability, you create a 1/1 white Zombie creature token. This ability triggers only once each turn.

cards.flavor: "Heed the Scarab's call, or be crushed upon their return!"
cards.name: Prophet of the Scarab
cards.text:
Vigilance
When this creature enters, draw cards equal to the number of Zombies you control or the number of Zombie cards in your graveyard, whichever is greater.

cards.flavor: "Kefnet may be gone, but the thirst for wisdom never dies."
cards.name: Rhet-Tomb Mystic
cards.text:
Flying
Each creature card in your hand has cycling {1}{U}. ({1}{U}, Discard that card: Draw a card.)

cards.name: Lost Monarch of Ifnir
cards.text:
Afflict 3 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, defending player loses 3 life.)
Other Zombies you control have afflict 3.
At the beginning of your second main phase, if a player was dealt combat damage by a Zombie this turn, mill three cards, then you may return a creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.name: Territorial Aetherkite
cards.text:
Flying, haste
When this creature enters, you get {E}{E} (two energy counters). Then you may pay one or more {E}. When you do, this creature deals that much damage to each other creature.

cards.flavor: "Zendikar still seems so far off, but Chandra is my home."
cards.name: Nissa, Worldsoul Speaker
cards.text:
Landfall - Whenever a land you control enters, you get {E}{E} (two energy counters).
You may pay eight {E} rather than pay the mana cost for permanent spells you cast.

cards.name: Peema Trailblazer
cards.text:
Trample
Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, you get that many {E} (energy counters).
Exhaust - Pay six {E}: Put two +1/+1 counters on this creature. Then draw cards equal to the greatest power among creatures you control. (Activate each exhaust ability only once.)

cards.name: Rampaging Aetherhood
cards.text:
Trample, ward {2}
At the beginning of your upkeep, you get an amount of {E} (energy counters) equal to this creature's power. Then you may pay one or more {E}. If you do, put that many +1/+1 counters on this creature.

cards.name: Adaptive Omnitool
cards.text:
Equipped creature gets +1/+1 for each artifact you control.
Whenever equipped creature attacks, look at the top six cards of your library. You may reveal an artifact card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
Equip {3}

cards.flavor: As Kaladesh became Avishkar, aether finally started flowing freely to all.
cards.name: Aetherflux Conduit
cards.text:
Whenever you cast a spell, you get an amount of {E} (energy counters) equal to the amount of mana spent to cast that spell.
{T}, Pay fifty {E}: Draw seven cards. You may cast any number of spells from your hand without paying their mana costs.

cards.name: Aetheric Amplifier
cards.text:
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
{4}, {T}: Choose one. Activate only as a sorcery.
â¢ Double the number of each kind of counter on target permanent.
â¢ Double the number of each kind of counter you have.

"Avishkar greets the Multiverse with an open hand, but do not assume we are defenseless."
-Pia Nalaar

cards.text:
Thopters you control get +1/+1.
If one or more artifact tokens would be created under your control, those tokens plus an additional 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying are created instead.

cards.flavor: "I do not wish for a return of the old gods, nor to recapture the glory of the past. I only wish to see my people thrive. That is enough."
cards.name: Swords to Plowshares
cards.text: Exile target creature. Its controller gains life equal to its power.

cards.name: Commence the Endgame
cards.text:
This spell can't be countered.
Draw two cards, then amass Zombies X, where X is the number of cards in your hand. (Put X +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. It's also a Zombie. If you don't control an Army, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)

cards.flavor: Forget the expected. Embrace the unpredictable.
cards.name: Reality Shift
cards.text: Exile target creature. Its controller manifests the top card of their library. (That player puts the top card of their library onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. If it's a creature card, it can be turned face up any time for its mana cost.)

cards.flavor: "Hail the Fly, the Wasp, the Scarab, the Locust, and the Scorpion!"
cards.name: Corpse Augur
cards.text: When Corpse Augur dies, you draw X cards and you lose X life, where X is the number of creature cards in target player's graveyard.

cards.flavor: The Chitin Court lurks, awaiting its chance to reclaim Amonkhet from the living.
cards.name: Cryptbreaker
cards.text:
{1}{B}, {T}, Discard a card: Create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.
Tap three untapped Zombies you control: You draw a card and you lose 1 life.

cards.flavor: Death wanders on Amonkhet, though as of late it has begun to advance with purpose.
cards.name: Grave Titan
cards.text:
Deathtouch
Whenever Grave Titan enters or attacks, create two 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens.

cards.flavor: A curse barely remembered, a vengeance not yet complete.
cards.name: Gravecrawler
cards.text:
Gravecrawler can't block.
You may cast Gravecrawler from your graveyard as long as you control a Zombie.

cards.flavor:
"We would be fools to trust the histories given to us by the Trespasser. We must seek the truth of our world, whatever the cost."
-Etha, vizier of invocations
cards.name: Midnight Reaper
cards.text: Whenever a nontoken creature you control dies, this creature deals 1 damage to you and you draw a card.

cards.name: Murderous Rider
cards.text:
Lifelink
When Murderous Rider dies, put it on the bottom of its owner's library.

cards.name: Swift End
cards.text: Destroy target creature or planeswalker. You lose 2 life. (Then exile this card. You may cast the creature later from exile.)

cards.name: Zombie Master
cards.text:
Other Zombie creatures have swampwalk. (They can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
Other Zombies have "{B}: Regenerate this permanent."

cards.flavor:
"Look, I don't know what happened. And I really wish I did, so I could do it again!"
-Tailpipe, Rocketeer
cards.name: Chain Reaction
cards.text: Chain Reaction deals X damage to each creature, where X is the number of creatures on the battlefield.

cards.flavor: Tools developed for infiltrating or sabotaging rival teams became new fields of research in their own right.
cards.name: Chaos Warp
cards.text: The owner of target permanent shuffles it into their library, then reveals the top card of their library. If it's a permanent card, they put it onto the battlefield.

cards.flavor: "Innovation was meant to end our wars, but it has only brought new conflicts. We must return to our roots."
cards.name: Druid of Purification
cards.text: When Druid of Purification enters, starting with you, each player may choose an artifact or enchantment you don't control. Destroy each permanent chosen this way.

cards.flavor: All trace of his kingdom had been worn away by the desert sand, but still he kept vigil over the dunes of his home.
cards.name: Corpse Knight
cards.text: Whenever another creature you control enters, each opponent loses 1 life.

cards.flavor: Dozens of empires lie dead and buried in the Broken Lands. But on Amonkhet, dead does not mean gone.
cards.name: Arcane Signet
cards.text: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.

cards.flavor: Avishkar's power comes from its joyful innovation, in the marvels that people can build when they work together for the common good.
cards.name: Arcane Signet
cards.text: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.

cards.flavor: The Omenpaths didn't just open portals to other worlds. It opened the eyes of many inventors who had been thinking too small.
cards.name: Chromatic Lantern
cards.text:
Lands you control have "{T}: Add one mana of any color."
{T}: Add one mana of any color.

cards.name: Duplicant
cards.text:
Imprint - When Duplicant enters, you may exile target nontoken creature.
As long as a card exiled with Duplicant is a creature card, Duplicant has the power, toughness, and creature types of the last creature card exiled with Duplicant. It's still a Shapeshifter.

cards.flavor: The Consulate may be gone, but a savvy street artist still needs to evade disgruntled property owners.
cards.name: Lightning Greaves
cards.text:
Equipped creature has haste and shroud. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
Equip {0}

cards.flavor:
"Our third sun approaches. Naktamun will remember its masters."
-Varina, monarch of the Broken Lands
cards.name: Sol Ring
cards.text: {T}: Add {C}{C}.

cards.flavor:
"Nissa asked if the light of foreign suns could affect the flora of Avishkar through Omenpaths. I built a device to capture such light for further testing."
-Rashmi, aether-seer
cards.name: Sol Ring
cards.text: {T}: Add {C}{C}.

cards.flavor:
"It's often said that an idea can never be killed. How I wish that were true."
-Saheeli Rai
cards.name: Academy Ruins
cards.text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{1}{U}, {T}: Put target artifact card from your graveyard on top of your library.

cards.flavor:
"The Wandering teaches us that life is not a binary existence. The body decays, but the mind persists. There must be a reason."
-Temmet, vizier of Naktamun
cards.name: Command Tower
cards.text: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.

cards.flavor:
"You think I sit in this seat because of luck? Because of providence? I hold this seat because I alone am fit to fill it."
-Gonti
cards.name: Command Tower
cards.text: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.

cards.name: Path of Ancestry
cards.text:
Path of Ancestry enters tapped.
{T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity. When that mana is spent to cast a creature spell that shares a creature type with your commander, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom.)

cards.text:
Flying
When Angel of Sanctions enters, you may exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls until Angel of Sanctions leaves the battlefield.

cards.flavor: What the gods decree, the mummies enforce.

cards.name: Dawn
cards.text:
Aftermath (Cast this spell only from your graveyard. Then exile it.)
Return all creature cards with power 2 or less from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.text:
Double strike
Whenever you cast a creature spell, create a 4/4 black Zombie Warrior creature token with vigilance.
When God-Eternal Oketra dies or is put into exile from the battlefield, you may put it into its owner's library third from the top.

Flying

"To survive up here, I've learned when to use my harpoon and when to just enjoy the view."
-Kadhu, skywhaler

Flying

Counter target spell. Its controller may draw up to two cards at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

cards.flavor: "Citizens, do not resist. This is for your safety. Tezzeret bids you to surrender your inventions. Now."
cards.name: Confiscation Coup
cards.text: Choose target artifact or creature. You get {E}{E}{E}{E} (four energy counters), then you may pay an amount of {E} equal to that permanent's mana value. If you do, gain control of it.

cards.flavor:
"How easily your flames are quenched."
-Baral, Chief of Compliance
cards.name: Disallow
cards.text: Counter target spell, activated ability, or triggered ability. (Mana abilities can't be targeted.)

cards.name: Era of Innovation
cards.text:
Whenever an artifact or Artificer you control enters, you may pay {1}. If you do, you get {E}{E} (two energy counters).
Pay six {E}, Sacrifice Era of Innovation: Draw three cards.

cards.name: Eternal Skylord
cards.text:
When Eternal Skylord enters, amass Zombies 2. (Put two +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. It's also a Zombie. If you don't control an Army, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)
Zombie tokens you control have flying.

cards.flavor:
"My earliest work escapes me."
-Stitcher Geralf
cards.name: Forgotten Creation
cards.text:
Skulk (This creature can't be blocked by creatures with greater power.)
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may discard all the cards in your hand. If you do, draw that many cards.

cards.flavor: Creators live for that moment of inspiration: precious, profound, perfect.
cards.name: Glimmer of Genius
cards.text: Scry 2, then draw two cards. You get {E}{E} (two energy counters).

cards.name: Midnight Clock
cards.text:
{T}: Add {U}.
{2}{U}: Put an hour counter on Midnight Clock.
At the beginning of each upkeep, put an hour counter on Midnight Clock.
When the twelfth hour counter is put on Midnight Clock, shuffle your hand and graveyard into your library, then draw seven cards. Exile Midnight Clock.

cards.flavor:
"When I grafted the Planar Bridge into myself, I felt my Planeswalker spark flare beyond my body. The Multiverse was my plaything. It felt . . . incredible."
-Tezzeret
cards.name: One with the Machine
cards.text: Draw cards equal to the highest mana value among artifacts you control.

cards.flavor:
"I do things in my own time."
-Etha, initiate of Rhet crop

cards.text: Draw X cards, then discard a card.

cards.flavor: "Industry without artistry is just a fancy way to fill the junkyard."
cards.name: Sai, Master Thopterist

Whenever you cast an artifact spell, create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying.

cards.text:

cards.flavor:
"Did you have a nice nap?"
-Liliana Vess

cards.text: Each player mills X cards. For each creature card put into a graveyard this way, you create a tapped 2/2 black Zombie creature token. (To mill a card, a player puts the top card of their library into their graveyard.)

Whenever a Zombie token you control with power 6 or greater attacks, it gains lifelink until end of turn.

cards.flavor: Grixis is a world where the only things found in abundance are death and decay. Corpses, whole or in part, are the standard currency among necromancers and demons.
cards.name: Fleshbag Marauder
cards.text: When Fleshbag Marauder enters, each player sacrifices a creature of their choice.

When you cycle Gempalm Polluter, you may have target player lose life equal to the number of Zombies on the battlefield.

cards.flavor:
"To see past the veil of death, cross it."
-The Red Book of Mezdrithalik
cards.name: Undead Augur
cards.text: Whenever Undead Augur or another Zombie you control dies, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

cards.flavor:
"Holy places are no longer sanctuary from death, and death is no longer sanctuary from anything."
-Thalia, Knight-Cathar
cards.name: Blasphemous Act
cards.text:
This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature on the battlefield.
Blasphemous Act deals 13 damage to each creature.

cards.name: Combustible Gearhulk
cards.text:
First strike
When Combustible Gearhulk enters, target opponent may have you draw three cards. If the player doesn't, you mill three cards, then Combustible Gearhulk deals damage to that player equal to the total mana value of those cards.

cards.flavor: "Catch me if you can."
cards.name: Lightning Runner
cards.text:
Double strike, haste
Whenever Lightning Runner attacks, you get {E}{E} (two energy counters), then you may pay eight {E}. If you pay, untap all creatures you control, and after this phase, there is an additional combat phase.

cards.flavor: Those with knowledge are wise to listen to those with imagination.
cards.name: Loyal Apprentice
cards.text:
Haste
Lieutenant - At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control your commander, create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying. That token gains haste until end of turn.

cards.name: Pia and Kiran Nalaar
cards.text:
When Pia and Kiran Nalaar enters, create two 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature tokens with flying.
{2}{R}, Sacrifice an artifact: Pia and Kiran Nalaar deals 2 damage to any target.

cards.flavor: Architects find inspiration in the dragon's beauty of form, while artificers are influenced by the function of its fire.
cards.name: Reckless Fireweaver
cards.text: Whenever an artifact you control enters, Reckless Fireweaver deals 1 damage to each opponent.

cards.flavor: Its frill inspired the design of efficient aether collectors.
cards.name: Aetherwind Basker
cards.text:
Trample
Whenever Aetherwind Basker enters or attacks, you get {E} (an energy counter) for each creature you control.
Pay {E}: Aetherwind Basker gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

cards.flavor: Next to her designs, life seems like a pale imitation.
cards.name: Architect of the Untamed
cards.text:
Landfall - Whenever a land you control enters, you get {E} (an energy counter).
Pay eight {E}: Create a 6/6 colorless Beast artifact creature token.

cards.flavor: "I've never seen a world where aether weaves through every aspect of nature."
cards.name: Attune with Aether
cards.text: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. You get {E}{E} (two energy counters).

cards.flavor: Labyrinths of tunnels beneath the streets of the Caldaia offer an ample array of discreet routes for enterprising smugglers.
cards.name: Bootleggers' Stash
cards.text: Lands you control have "{T}: Create a Treasure token."

cards.name: Elder Gargaroth
cards.text:
Vigilance, reach, trample
Whenever Elder Gargaroth attacks or blocks, choose one -
â¢ Create a 3/3 green Beast creature token.
â¢ You gain 3 life.
â¢ Draw a card.

cards.flavor: Torching Krosa would be pointless. It grows faster than it burns.
cards.name: Explosive Vegetation
cards.text: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

cards.flavor: "The Great Conduit connects us all."
cards.name: Peema Aether-Seer
cards.text:
When Peema Aether-Seer enters, you get an amount of {E} (energy counters) equal to the greatest power among creatures you control.
Pay {E}{E}{E}: Target creature blocks this turn if able.

cards.flavor: "Creation without connection to nature is just manufacture."
cards.name: Servant of the Conduit
cards.text:
When Servant of the Conduit enters, you get {E}{E} (two energy counters).
{T}, Pay {E}: Add one mana of any color.

cards.flavor: Liliana whispered to whatever consciousness Oketra and Bontu had left. "You are the gods. He is the usurper. You know what to do."
cards.name: Despark
cards.text: Exile target permanent with mana value 4 or greater.

cards.name: Gleaming Overseer
cards.text:
When Gleaming Overseer enters, amass Zombies 1. (Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. It's also a Zombie. If you don't control an Army, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)
Zombie tokens you control have hexproof and menace.

cards.flavor:
"Cease all psychic attacks pending intel on enemy countermeasures."
-Dimir communiquÃ©
cards.name: Lazotep Chancellor
cards.text: Whenever you discard a card, you may pay {1}. If you do, amass Zombies 2. (Put two +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. It's also a Zombie. If you don't control an Army, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)

cards.flavor: "It's natural, it's all around us, and it's there for the taking. Just try and tell me what I'm doing is wrong."
cards.name: Rogue Refiner
cards.text: When Rogue Refiner enters, draw a card and you get {E}{E} (two energy counters).

cards.name: Saheeli, Sublime Artificer
cards.text:
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token.
[â2]: Target artifact you control becomes a copy of another target artifact or creature you control until end of turn, except it's an artifact in addition to its other types.

cards.name: The Scarab God
cards.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, each opponent loses X life and you scry X, where X is the number of Zombies you control.
{2}{U}{B}: Exile target creature card from a graveyard. Create a token that's a copy of it, except it's a 4/4 black Zombie.
When The Scarab God dies, return it to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.

cards.flavor: If one of the anointed fails to serve with perfect obedience, the desert is always ready to receive it.
cards.name: Wayward Servant
cards.text: Whenever another Zombie you control enters, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

cards.flavor: The first tentative flaps are like a song to his soul.

cards.text:

Pay {E}{E}{E}: Create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying.

cards.name: Aetherworks Marvel
cards.text:
Whenever a permanent you control is put into a graveyard, you get {E} (an energy counter).
{T}, Pay six {E}: Look at the top six cards of your library. You may cast a spell from among them without paying its mana cost. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

cards.flavor:
"The worthy shall strive for greatness. Supremacy in life leads to supremacy in the afterlife."

Gate to the Afterlife
cards.text:
Whenever a nontoken creature you control dies, you gain 1 life. Then you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Gate to the Afterlife: Search your graveyard, hand, and/or library for a card named God-Pharaoh's Gift and put it onto the battlefield. If you search your library this way, shuffle. Activate only if there are six or more creature cards in your graveyard.

cards.name: God-Pharaoh's Gift

cards.text:
Creatures you control are every creature type. The same is true for creature spells you control and creature cards you own that aren't on the battlefield.
